title: Geth on OSX segfaults for most of 1.6x releases
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.6.x
OS & Version: OSX

I had to go back to 1.5.9 for it to not crash.. although I skipped 1.6.0, 1.6.1, 1.6.2

#### Expected behaviour
Not crash

#### Actual behaviour
It crashes

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour


#### Backtrace

````
fatal error: unexpected signal during runtime execution
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x0 pc=0x7fff84d48939]
````

Assigned to @karalabe because USB stuff is on the stack.
Should be fixed now on master.
